name.description: The name of the Bolt task or plan to run.

parameters.description: The task or plan parameters to use for this run.

targets.description: Targets for this action. Either as a comma-separated string, or as a list.

project.description: The Bolt project to load and source tasks, plans, and other content from

source.description: Where to get the project from

version.description: The version to retrive from the source. Semantics vary depending on source type

transport.description: The default transport to use when connecting to targets

sshKey.description: the private ssh key for the connection

inventory.description: A Bolt inventory to use when running this action
